applications.name: Boltz
applications.description: Protein structure prediction using deep learning
applications.long_description: Boltz is an advanced tool for predicting protein structures using state-of-the-art deep learning models. It leverages CUDA acceleration for fast inference and includes pre-downloaded model weights for immediate use.

applications.name: GROMACS
applications.long_description: GROMACS is a versatile package for molecular dynamics simulations, primarily designed for biochemical molecules. It provides high performance through GPU acceleration and optimized algorithms.

applications.name: BLAST
applications.long_description: BLAST finds regions of similarity between biological sequences. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance of matches.

applications.name: ProteinMPNN
applications.description: Message passing neural network for protein design
applications.long_description: ProteinMPNN is a deep learning method for computational protein design. It uses message passing neural networks to predict amino acid sequences that will fold into desired protein structures.

applications.name: RFdiffusion2
applications.long_description: RFdiffusion2 uses denoising diffusion probabilistic models to generate novel protein structures. It can design proteins with specific functional properties and structural motifs.

applications.name: UFold
applications.description: RNA secondary structure prediction using deep learning
applications.long_description: UFold is a deep learning-based method for predicting RNA secondary structure from sequence. It uses a U-Net inspired architecture to directly predict base pairing probabilities.

applications.name: IntaRNA
applications.long_description: IntaRNA efficiently predicts RNA-RNA interactions, considering both hybridization and accessibility. It uses dynamic programming algorithms for accurate interaction site prediction.

applications.name: RNAmigos2
applications.long_description: RNAmigos2 predicts RNA-small molecule interactions using graph neural networks. It enables virtual screening of compounds for RNA-targeted drug discovery.

applications.name: FreeBindCraft
applications.description: Free energy calculation for protein-ligand binding
applications.long_description: FreeBindCraft performs accurate free energy calculations for protein-ligand complexes. It combines molecular dynamics simulations with advanced sampling techniques.

applications.name: RNAhybrid
applications.long_description: RNAhybrid is a tool for finding the minimum free energy hybridization of a long and a short RNA. It is particularly useful for microRNA target prediction.
